response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and contribute greatly to your success. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I understand its worth to you stands at $1,200,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000, aiming to provide you with an opportunity to secure this valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the potential for a fruitful partnership.", "product_price": 950000}
